Many have blamed hatred of the EU on the principal of it being viewed as an anti democratic organisation,

The EU in concept would be fantastic however many feel that the EU has become more of a dictatorship and unaccountable for its actions,

This petition encorages the government to support the founding of an EU government where all EU decision making is decided by the will of the people through the creation of EU wide democratic parties and in effect the creation of a Federal Europe,

The EU is already a Federation in all but name and as a result anti democratic processes take place without the consent or will of the people, if europe wants to succeed and acheive its goal as a great power simply move to the state system and allow europeans the freedom to dictate the will of europe by the creation of democratic parties and a federal system.

Give people democracy in the EU and the hatred will turn to support.
